a.style: font-family:'Playfair Display', Georgia, 'Times New Roman', 'Liberation Serif', serif

text.tspan: Social expenditure as share of GDP, OECD - Total, 1980 to 2015
Public social expenditure covers financial flows controlled by General Government (different levels of government
and social security funds), as social insurance and social assistance payments.
Source: OECD Stats (2019), The OECD Social Expenditure Database
